input.sentences: i went to the lecture series today .
the first one was about a woman 's trip around the world .
another man showed us some history .
this group wanted to show us their designs for a new product
and had interesting ideas to share with us .
output.sentences: The woman has been called upon to give a presentation.
The woman is lecturing on Around the World in Eighty Days.
The woman does an excellent job in explaining history viewing each slide.
The woman goes into depth on one of the slides and calls upon her co-worker to share in explaining the slide.
